A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney finally destroyed what was left of a franchise that Lucas couldn’t complete with episodes 1-3. The characters were a joke. The writing was terrible\, i have no idea what they were thinking when they wrote this garbage. I had high hopes after rouge one\, but this was a complete waste of time and money. Not looking forward to the next installment. Everything was so forced it left nothing to be appreciated. I would not recommend this movie...new blood does not mean a better product\, unfortunately the Mouse as killed this franchise as a pathetic attempt to capitalize on a new audience and ran off the old audience from such a great franchise
